*(01-01-2013) - r**35712-2*:

  * Updated FFmpeg to git 1e28fa2
  * Updated libvpx to 1.2.0
  * Added icon/version info for MEncoder
  * Removed Live555.

rtsp:// urls, previously handled by Live555, are now handled by ffmpeg by prefixing it with ffmpeg:// (ex: ffmpeg://rtsp://url.to/stream). Pthreads (pthreadGC2.dll) has also been made static, no longer requiring the pthread dll to run.

This build fixes "Unsupported Pixel**Format" spamming that occurred with some H.264 videos.
